title: FULL FREE AMS COURSE - Keyword Feature of Publisher Rocket

tactics.name: AMS Keyword Generation
tactics.description: Using Publisher Rocket to generate keywords for Amazon Advertising campaigns by searching for descriptive phrases and exporting relevant keywords.
steps: Select AMS keyword search in Publisher Rocket
Type in a descriptive phrase about the book
Filter and export the generated keywords
caveats: Authors may need to filter out irrelevant keywords
source_quotes: Amazon in their official documents recommends that you use at a minimum of 100 plus keywords to start with per campaign

claims.statement: Publisher Rocket automates keyword research for Amazon Advertising campaigns by pulling data from Amazon's search results and similar books.
source_quotes: Publisher Rocket will get to work pulling all the pertinent information and listing it for you
